name: Brighton Scavenged Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to reconstruct Domain and Remnant hulls into what can be charitably called semi-functional vessels used by the Brighton Federation.

name: Brighton Reconstructed Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to reconstruct Domain and Remnant hulls into vessels of established make, but of drastically reduced quality.

name: Domain Resurgent Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct hulls modified by the Domain Resurgent, with a focus on autonomous ships with strong defense and an emphasis on ballistic weaponry.
